headline.print_headline: NYC Restaurants Post Salt Warnings, and Diners Shrug
headline.main: NYC Restaurants Post Salt Warnings, and Diners Shrug

docs.lead_paragraph: As warning labels go, the small salt shaker emblems that began showing up on some New York City restaurant menus recently are fairly unobtrusive, but each is supposed to carry a powerful message. If the black and white logo appears next to a dish, it means it contains more salt, by itself, than doctors recommend that a person ingest in an entire day.
